title: Sweet and Spicy Chickpeas
ingredients: ['400g can chickpeas, drained and rinsed', 'finely grated zest and juice of 1 lime', '1 tsp caster sugar', '1 tsp garam masala', '1/2 tsp ground cinnamon', '1 tsp dried oregano', '2 tbsp sunflower oil', '2 small onions, halved and thickly sliced', '2 peppers (1 red, yellow or orange and 1 green), halved and thickly sliced', '12 baby plum or cherry tomatoes, halved']
